definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

sentences.english: He will give us a talk on the history of the Party.
sentences.chinese: 他将给我们做个关于党史的报告。

sentences.english: A:What's the result of the dispute between the two parties?
sentences.chinese: 两党史争端的结局怎么样了？

sentences.english: That winter we set out to write a history of the Party.
sentences.chinese: 那年冬天，我们着手写一部党史。

sentences.english: He is going to give us a report on the history of our Party.
sentences.chinese: 他将给我们做一个关于党史的报告。

sentences.english: The Democratic Party is the party of longest continuous existence .
sentences.chinese: 民主党则是的党史最长且其间从未中断过的政党。

sentences.english: Online 'red' game acquaints players with Party history.
sentences.chinese: 上海推出全国红色网游游戏中学习党史。

definition: Deng Xiaoping Theory/Dengism/the foundation of PRC economic development after the Cultural Revolution, building the capitalist economy within Chinese Communist Party control
party affairs/work within the Communist party
the spirit or character of a political party
Selected Works of Mao Zedong/abbr. for 毛澤東選集|毛泽东选集[Mao2 Ze2 dong1 Xuan3 ji2]
abbr. for 中國共產黨|中国共产党[Zhong1 guo2 Gong4 chan3 dang3], Chinese Communist Party
